## Expand for Session Info
```{r}
#| echo: false
library(sessioninfo)

# Print session_info with quarto version added
pkg_sesh <- session_info(pkgs = "attached")
pkg_sesh$platform$quarto <- paste(system("quarto --version", intern = TRUE))
pkg_sesh
```
:::
